text: Frederick Samuel (Fred) Zaplitny (June 9, 1913 - March 19, 1964) was a Canadian politician. He represented the electoral district of Dauphin in the House of Commons of Canada from 1945 to 1949, and from 1953 to 1958. He was a member of the Cooperative Commonwealth Federation.http://www.mhs.mb.ca/docs/people/zaplitny_fs.shtml Zaplitny also sought election to the Legislative Assembly of Manitoba in the provincial elections of 1936, 1941 and 1949, but was never successful in being elected to the provincial legislature. Zaplitny was of Ukrainian descent. ==References== * Category:1913 births Category:1964 deaths Category:Members of the House of Commons of Canada from Manitoba Category:Co-operative Commonwealth Federation MPs Category:Canadian people of Ukrainian descent Category:20th-century Canadian politicians
title: Fred Zaplitny
